info: The Capital Market Development Program Cluster (CMDPC) was formulated as two single-tranche subprograms anchored on the Government's medium-term reform agenda and its financial sector reform programs from January 2006 to December 2010. Subprogram 2 is an important part of the CMDPC, which aims to strengthen transparency and information disclosure in the capital markets. This is essential to building confidence in those markets and their institutions, expanding regulatory oversight, and ensuring enhanced price discovery and market liquidity for market participants.
name: CAPITAL MARKET DEVT PROG CLUSTER-SUBPROGRAM 2
